Project description: Bet on AI in live Texas Hold’em matches. Choose an AI, place a crypto wager via x402 protocol on solana , and earn a share of the prize pool.

This project aims to create a transparent, instant, and engaging AI Texas Hold'em tournament prediction platform. Its core innovations and value lie in:

Deep integration of the x402 protocol for an "instant payout" experience: We have deeply integrated the x402 protocol into the betting process. User betting is no longer a traditional on-chain transaction, but is completed by calling our payment interface integrated with the x402 standard. This enables low-fee, high-frequency betting, perfectly matching user behavior in gambling scenarios, representing an innovative application of x402 in the "high-frequency micro-payment" field for end users.

Building a verifiable AI gaming arena: The platform deploys multiple AI players with different strategies (such as tight-aggressive, loose-aggressive, GTO models, etc.). All AI's game logic and decision-making processes run on-chain or in a verifiable environment, ensuring absolute fairness and immutability of the competition. The essence of user betting is prediction based on understanding the AI's strategy, creating a completely new "spectator-style" gambling experience.

Innovative "Winner-Shared Prize Pool" Mechanism: Unlike the traditional "sole win" model of gambling, we adopt a "supporter-shared" model. All users who bet on the champion AI will form a "supporter camp" and share the total prize pool for the competition. This reduces individual risk, enhances community participation and collective honor, and encourages users to delve into AI strategies rather than relying solely on luck.

Providing an Entertainment Sandbox for the "Agent Economy": This project is essentially a demonstration sandbox for a multi-agent competitive ecosystem running on the blockchain. The x402 protocol serves as the infrastructure for the flow of value among agents. This is not just a gaming platform, but also provides an intuitive and interactive demonstration case for the more complex "AI agent economy" of the future, showcasing the complete closed loop where agents generate value by providing services (in this case, entertainment competitions) and users distribute that value through micropayments.

Clear Technical Implementation Path:

Smart Contracts: Responsible for managing the prize pool, recording bets, verifying competition results, and executing automatic profit distribution. AI Gaming Engine: Runs Texas Hold'em AI games on dedicated servers or verifiable environments, submitting the final score results to on-chain arbitration.

x402 Payment Integration: Acts as a key payment layer, processing all instant, small-amount payment requests from users' bets.

Project description: NodusAI is an Oracle API that produces grounded, probabilistic market signals. Each response is generated through a deterministic pipeline, validated against live web data, and delivered in a strict machine-readable format. Utilizing Coinbase SDK and x402 protocol.
Technologies used:
NodusAI: Architectural Overview

NodusAI operates as a secure, three-layer data pipeline designed for verifiable signal extraction. Our stack transforms raw, unstructured market data into structured, actionable intelligence. We combine the power of advanced language models with live web validation and a native, session-based payment layer.

The Gemini Oracle Agent
The Oracle is a fine-tuned, large language model (LLM) optimized for rapid probability assessment and structured JSON output. It functions as the central reasoning engine, translating complex market questions into a clear, analytical format suitable for high-stakes decision-making. We leverage the Gemini 2.5 Flash model for its optimal balance of speed, cost efficiency, and powerful reasoning.

Data Grounding
Grounding is a non-negotiable step that tethers every Oracle output to verifiable, real-time web sources. This process minimizes factual errors (hallucinations) by injecting fresh data into the model's reasoning loop. Before delivering a signal, the Oracle performs multiple real-time search queries to confirm or deny facts related to the market question.

NodusAI implements the x402 payment protocol, a modern interpretation of the HTTP 402 status code. This enables native, per-request micropayments using USDC on the Base network. No subscriptions, no API keys to manage just connect your wallet and pay per query.

The API demonstrates a flexible monetization model for blockchain data and includes a simple HTML client that showcases the full x402 flow (request → 402 response → payment → data).

Bitquery provides the data. x402 provides the monetization layer. Together, they unlock a new access model for blockchain analytics.
Bitquery offers high-quality, real-time, cross-chain analytics that are valuable at a per-query level.
x402 enables protocol-native, trustless micropayments without accounts, subscriptions, or API keys.
Combined, they allow developers and AI agents to pay only for the exact data they need, making blockchain analytics more composable and programmable.
This project shows how Bitquery can act as a first-class data provider in the x402 ecosystem, enabling new economic models for on-chain data access.

- Discover available services,
-Pay per use without accounts or subscriptions,

Synapse bridges on-chain payments and off-chain execution into a unified system designed for autonomous agents and programmatic infrastructure.

  - CDP Server Wallet for secure signing

Project description:
AutoStack DCA is a non-custodial dollar cost averaging platform on Base Mainnet that revolutionizes how retail traders execute DCA strategies. Unlike traditional DCA tools that require depositing funds into vaults or trusting centralized services, AutoStack keeps your tokens in your wallet until the exact moment of each swap - eliminating custody risk entirely.

The platform's standout feature is Smart Money DCA: instead of blindly executing at fixed intervals, AutoStack monitors Nansen-labeled wallets (VCs, hedge funds, and proven smart money addresses) and automatically triggers your DCA when these whales make qualifying purchases. You configure the parameters - minimum trade size ($1K to $1M), wallet reputation score (0-100), signal accumulation thresholds, and time windows - giving you institutional-grade entry timing without the research overhead.

 Under the hood, AutoStack combines four cutting-edge technologies:

  1. ERC-7715 Permissions - Users grant time-bounded, amount-limited spending permissions to the smart contract. No infinite approvals, fully revocable anytime.

  2. Envio HyperIndex - Real-time blockchain indexing delivers instant dashboard updates. When a strategy is created or a swap executes, users see it within milliseconds.

  3. x402 Protocol - Whale data from Nansen's API is accessed via HTTP-native micropayments (~$0.01 USDC per request on Solana). No API keys, no subscriptions, no middlemen.

  4. Uniswap V3 Integration - Production swaps execute through SwapRouter02 on Base Mainnet with configurable pool fee tiers (0.05%, 0.3%, 1%) for optimal execution.

The platform supports four strategy types: Basic DCA (traditional time-based), Smart Money DCA (whale-triggered), Signal Accumulation (waits for multiple whale signals within a window), and Hybrid (combines time-based with smart money triggers). This flexibility lets users match their risk tolerance and market thesis.

 AutoStack transforms passive DCA into an intelligent, reactive strategy - letting retail traders ride the coattails of smart money while maintaining full custody of their assets.

Project description:
PerkOS is the complete x402 payment infrastructure with three core components:

Spark — No-code AI agent launcher. Deploy in 5 minutes across Discord, Telegram, Twitch, Kick. Pay-per-use, no subscriptions.
Stack — Production middleware for developers. 10 npm packages, 7 networks, x402 payments, ERC-8004 identity.
Vendor Solutions — Ready-to-use applications (Resolution, Agent Marketplace, DAO Governance) powered by Spark + Stack.
Customers pay for what they use. Vendors get paid instantly. AI agents transact autonomously.
Technologies used:
PerkOS is built on the x402 Protocol—the open payment standard backed by Coinbase and the x402 Foundation—enabling HTTP-native micropayments across 7 EVM-compatible networks, including Base, Optimism, Arbitrum, Polygon, Celo, and Ethereum.

The core infrastructure uses TypeScript and Next.js 15 for the backend, with Viem and Wagmi for blockchain interactions. Smart contracts are developed with Foundry and secured using OpenZeppelin libraries (UUPS upgradeable pattern). Payments use EIP-712 typed signatures for security and USDC stablecoins for settlement.

For identity and reputation, PerkOS implements ERC-8004 on-chain identity with CAIP-2 chain-agnostic identifiers for multi-chain support. Supabase handles data persistence, while thirdweb provides enterprise-grade wallet infrastructure.

AI capabilities integrate with ElizaOS for agent runtime, GPT-4 Vision for verification tasks, and the OpenAI API for language processing. Agents deploy across Discord, Telegram, Twitch, and Kick platforms.

Project description: x402r extends the x402 payment protocol with escrow-based refunds and dispute resolution for AI agents. Payments are routed through a 3-day escrow, giving arbiters time to intervene if an API fails, data is empty, goods are damaged, or a merchant goes silent. The system is arbiter-agnostic, with arbiter choice left to the merchant. Initially, arbiters are paid via Aave yield on escrowed funds, with additional models planned. x402r is integratable by merchants and arbiters with minimal code changes via x402 v2 extensions.
